courses.title: Web Development Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build modern websites. Perfect for beginners who want to start their journey in web development.

videoLessons.title: Introduction to HTML
videoLessons.description: Learn the fundamentals of HTML structure and elements

videoLessons.title: CSS Styling Basics
videoLessons.description: Master CSS selectors, properties, and styling techniques

videoLessons.title: JavaScript Fundamentals
videoLessons.description: Understand JavaScript syntax, variables, and functions

videoLessons.title: Responsive Design
videoLessons.description: Create mobile-friendly websites with responsive design

videoLessons.title: DOM Manipulation
videoLessons.description: Learn to interact with the Document Object Model

videoLessons.title: Project: Personal Portfolio
videoLessons.description: Build a complete portfolio website from scratch

courses.title: Python Programming
courses.description: Master Python programming from basics to advanced concepts. Learn data structures, algorithms, and build real-world projects.

videoLessons.title: Python Basics
videoLessons.description: Introduction to Python syntax and basic concepts

videoLessons.title: Data Types and Variables
videoLessons.description: Understanding Python data types and variable assignment

videoLessons.title: Control Structures
videoLessons.description: Learn about loops, conditionals, and control flow

videoLessons.title: Functions and Modules
videoLessons.description: Create reusable code with functions and modules

videoLessons.title: Object-Oriented Programming
videoLessons.description: Master classes, objects, and inheritance in Python

videoLessons.title: File Handling
videoLessons.description: Read and write files in Python applications

videoLessons.title: Error Handling
videoLessons.description: Handle exceptions and errors gracefully

videoLessons.title: Project: To-Do App
videoLessons.description: Build a complete to-do application with Python

courses.title: Data Science with R
courses.description: Explore data analysis, visualization, and statistical modeling using R. Perfect for aspiring data scientists.

videoLessons.title: R Basics and Environment
videoLessons.description: Introduction to R programming environment and syntax

videoLessons.title: Data Import and Export
videoLessons.description: Learn to import and export data in various formats

videoLessons.title: Data Manipulation with dplyr
videoLessons.description: Master data manipulation using the dplyr package

videoLessons.title: Data Visualization with ggplot2
videoLessons.description: Create beautiful visualizations with ggplot2

videoLessons.title: Statistical Analysis
videoLessons.description: Perform statistical tests and analysis in R

videoLessons.title: Machine Learning Basics
videoLessons.description: Introduction to machine learning with R

videoLessons.title: Project: Sales Analysis
videoLessons.description: Complete data science project analyzing sales data
